title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: SUI and POL Rise 7.5%, Leading Index Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: The CoinDesk 20 index gained 2.1% from Monday, led by Sui and Polygon.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2556.62, up 2.1% (+52.39) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

Fifteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: SUI (+7.5%) and POL (+7.5%).

Laggards: FIL (-4.5%) and XLM (-1.6%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 index gained 2.1% with 15 of 20 assets trading higher, led by SUI and POL both rising 7.5%.
